remarks: Cancellation law for group subtraction ( ~ npncan2 analog). (Contributed by AV, 24-Nov-2019.)
statement:
grpsubadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpsubadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpsubadd.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
grpnpncan0.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
grpnpncan0 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .- Y ) .+ ( Y .- X ) ) = .0. ) $.
